long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ¦ Flap your way to fun with Flappy Bird for Chrome! ğŸ¦

Flappy Bird for Chrome is a faithful adaptation of the popular mobile game that took the world by storm. Itâ€™s easy to learn and incredibly addictive. The retro graphics and competitive leaderboard keep you coming back for more.

ğŸ‘‰ How to play: ğŸ‘ˆ

Click on the screen, or use your spacebar to get started.
Fly the bird as far as you can without hitting a pipe!
Challenge your friends and see who can get the highest score!
ğŸ‘ Why youâ€™ll love Flappy Bird for Chrome: ğŸ‘
No internet required: play offline anytime, anywhere.
No ads or in-app purchases: enjoy this captivating arcade game without any hidden charges or distractions.
Safe and secure: the extension requires minimal permissions and does not collect or share any personal data.
